message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $140.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, $130 is a bit lower than I was thinking. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $145.
I'm not sure $145 is a good deal for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $135. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $135. I'm willing to compromise at $142.50, which is a bit higher than your last offer, but still a good discount from the original price.
I'm not sure $142.50 is a good deal for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $137.50. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
